title: 3dmerge
description: 3dmerge edits and merges 3D datasets by applying various operations like thresholding, blurring, clustering, and more.

blur_fwhm.title: Blur FWHM
blur_fwhm.description: Gaussian blur with FWHM in mm

threshold.title: Threshold value
threshold.description: Threshold data to censor the intensities; only valid for 'fith', 'fico', or 'fitt' datasets

clust.title: Cluster parameters (rmm, vmul)
clust.description: Form clusters with connection distance and clip off data not in clusters of a minimum volume

dindex.title: Data sub-brick index
dindex.description: Specify sub-brick #j as the data source

tindex.title: Threshold sub-brick index
tindex.description: Specify sub-brick #k as the threshold source

dxyz.title: Cluster editing voxel dimension flag
dxyz.description: Force cluster editing to behave as if all voxel dimensions were set to 1 mm

gmax.title: Max intensity flag
gmax.description: Combine datasets by taking max intensity

quiet.title: Quiet output flag
quiet.description: Reduce the number of messages shown
